page.title: 16BUCKFASTLEIGH C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: {Buckfastleigh School }is 119 years old.To start with it was an all age school going up to the age of 14 years then 15 years.It changed in{1951}to a primary school.The excellent lunches are cooked on the premises.About 170 of the{240}pupils have these cooked meals.The rest bring packed lunches. There are various clubs including { {pottery,table-tennis,badmington,chess, {computer studies and "greenfingers".} The pupils come from as far around as{ Holne,Scorriton,The Old Totnes Rd, Dean and Buckfast.The ages of the pupils are from 5-11 years.There are 10 teaching staff and 15 extra staff including cleaners,caretakers and dinner ladies.In our school year 38 weeks are spent at school and 14 weeks on holiday.The four teams in our school are{Tamar,Exe,Teign and Dart. }
